title: Build problem rust.

labels.name: A-linkage
labels.description: Area: linking into static, shared libraries and binaries

labels.name: A-LLVM
labels.description: Area: Code generation parts specific to LLVM. Both correctness bugs and optimization-related issues.

labels.name: T-compiler
labels.description: Relevant to the compiler team, which will review and decide on the PR/issue.

labels.name: T-bootstrap
labels.description: Relevant to the bootstrap subteam: Rust's build system (x.py and src/bootstrap)

body:
When assembling rust from version 1.64.0 to 1.66.0, the same error occurs.

```rust
error: linking with `cc` failed: exit status: 1
  |
  = note: "cc" "-m64" "/tmp/rustceamVxw/symbols.o" "/builddir/build/BUILD/rustc-1.63.0-src/build/x86_64-unknown-linux-gnu/stage0-rustc/x86_64-unknown-linux-gnu/release/deps/rustc_main-77d8635c0eeefc6c.rustc_main.b2b0befe-cgu.0.rcgu.o" "/builddir/build/BUILD/rustc-1.63.0-src/build/x86_64-unknown-linux-gnu/stage0-rustc/x86_64-unknown-linux-gnu/release/deps/rustc_main-77d8635c0eeefc6c.rustc_main.b2b0befe-cgu.1.rcgu.o" "/builddir/build/BUILD/rustc-1.63.0-src/build/x86_64-unknown-linux-gnu/stage0-rustc/x86_64-unknown-linux-gnu/release/deps/rustc_main-77d8635c0eeefc6c.rustc_main.b2b0befe-cgu.2.rcgu.o" "-Wl,--as-needed" "-L" "/builddir/build/BUILD/rustc-1.63.0-src/build/x86_64-unknown-linux-gnu/stage0-rustc/x86_64-unknown-linux-gnu/release/deps" "-L" "/builddir/build/BUILD/rustc-1.63.0-src/build/x86_64-unknown-linux-gnu/stage0-rustc/release/deps" "-L" "/builddir/build/BUILD/rustc-1.63.0-src/build/x86_64-unknown-linux-gnu/stage0-rustc/x86_64-unknown-linux-gnu/release/build/psm-5662ceb2fe98fe88/out" "-L" "/builddir/build/BUILD/rustc-1.63.0-src/build/x86_64-unknown-linux-gnu/stage0-rustc/x86_64-unknown-linux-gnu/release/build/rustc_llvm-9f080b00c588d0c6/out" "-L" "/usr/lib64" "-L" "/usr/lib64/gcc/x86_64-rosa-linux-gnu/11.2.0/../../../../lib64" "-L" "/builddir/build/BUILD/rustc-1.63.0-src/build/x86_64-unknown-linux-gnu/stage0-sysroot/lib/rustlib/x86_64-unknown-linux-gnu/lib" "-L" "/builddir/build/BUILD/rustc-1.63.0-src/build/x86_64-unknown-linux-gnu/stage0-rustc/x86_64-unknown-linux-gnu/release/deps" "-lrustc_driver-2eb1444eee3137e4" "-Wl,--start-group" "-L" "/builddir/build/BUILD/rustc-1.63.0-src/build/x86_64-unknown-linux-gnu/stage0-sysroot/lib/rustlib/x86_64-unknown-linux-gnu/lib" "-lstd-092579b678e09e9a" "-Wl,--end-group" "-Wl,-Bstatic" "/builddir/build/BUILD/rustc-1.63.0-src/build/x86_64-unknown-linux-gnu/stage0-sysroot/lib/rustlib/x86_64-unknown-linux-gnu/lib/libcompiler_builtins-381d3bc791252907.rlib" "-Wl,-Bdynamic" "-lPolly" "-lPollyISL" "-lrt" "-ldl" "-lpthread" "-lm" "-lz" "-ldl" "-lgcc_s" "-lutil" "-lrt" "-lpthread" "-lm" "-ldl" "-lc" "-Wl,--eh-frame-hdr" "-Wl,-znoexecstack" "-L" "/builddir/build/BUILD/rustc-1.63.0-src/build/x86_64-unknown-linux-gnu/stage0-sysroot/lib/rustlib/x86_64-unknown-linux-gnu/lib" "-o" "/builddir/build/BUILD/rustc-1.63.0-src/build/x86_64-unknown-linux-gnu/stage0-rustc/x86_64-unknown-linux-gnu/release/deps/rustc_main-77d8635c0eeefc6c" "-Wl,--gc-sections" "-pie" "-Wl,-zrelro,-znow" "-Wl,-O1" "-nodefaultlibs" "-Wl,-z,relro,-z,now"
  = note: /usr/bin/x86_64-rosa-linux-gnu-ld: /builddir/build/BUILD/rustc-1.63.0-src/build/x86_64-unknown-linux-gnu/stage0-rustc/x86_64-unknown-linux-gnu/release/deps/librustc_driver-2eb1444eee3137e4.so: undefined reference to `std::_Sp_make_shared_tag::_S_eq(std::type_info const&)'
          collect2: error: ld returned 1 exit status
          
  = help: some `extern` functions couldn't be found; some native libraries may need to be installed or have their path specified
  = note: use the `-l` flag to specify native libraries to link
  = note: use the `cargo:rustc-link-lib` directive to specify the native libraries to link with Cargo (see https://doc.rust-lang.org/cargo/reference/build-scripts.html#cargorustc-link-libkindname)
error: could not compile `rustc-main` due to previous error
```

I do not understand the reason for the build failure
[build_log.zip](https://github.com/rust-lang/rust/files/10250290/build_log.zip)
